content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generation system at x=-25.0 y=80.5
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at x=-20.5 y=69.5 (connected to water system)
- Boiler at x=-25.0 y=80.5 (currently out of fuel)
- Steam engine at x=-25.5 y=89.5 (not connected to power network)
- Pipe networks:
  - Water system (ID 1454) connecting pump to boiler
  - Steam system (ID 1458) not properly connected to engine

### Copper mining operation at x=-46.5 y=70.5
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=-46.5 y=70.5 (output blocked, no power)
- Stone furnace at x=-46.0 y=74.0 (missing in latest steps)
- Burner inserter at x=-46.5 y=72.5 (recently placed)
- Wooden chest at x=-46.5 y=76.5 (empty output storage)
- Small electric pole at x=-44.5 y=72.5 (not powering drill)

### Iron mining operation at x=15.5 y=70.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=15.5 y=70.5 (currently no power)
- Stone furnace at x=16.0 y=74.0 (no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at x=15.5 y=72.5 (working but missing from some steps)
- Wooden chest at x=15.5 y=75.5 (empty output storage)

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent entity verification failures
- Verify entity existence before operations (repeated attempts to access missing burner inserter and furnace)
- Implement entity tracking system to monitor changes in entity states

### Power system issues
- Connect electric mining drills to power network (copper drill shows "no power")
- Ensure proper fuel supply for boiler (currently out of fuel)
- Verify steam engine connections (still not connected to power network)

### Placement and distance problems
- Move closer before placing entities (failed chest placement at x=-46.5 y=76.5)
- Implement distance checks before placement attempts
- Verify terrain suitability for placement (stone furnace placement issues)

### Production chain problems
- Clear output blockages on mining drills (copper drill shows "output blocked")
- Ensure proper inserter connections (new burner inserter needs verification)
- Verify furnace existence and connections (missing furnace at copper operation)

### Fluid system issues
- Complete steam pipe connection between boiler and engine
- Verify fluid system IDs and connections (steam system ID 1458 not connected)

### System verification
- Implement pre-operation checks for all systems (power, fluids, production)
- Verify entity inventories before attempting operations
- Monitor system status indicators (warnings and error messages)
